items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript‚Äîmaking it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: Tired of manually renaming images when saving them from the web? Save Image with Description is your solution! This lightweight Chrome extension automatically extracts descriptive text‚Äîsuch as captions, alt text, or nearby descriptions‚Äîfrom images on any webpage and uses it to name your downloaded file.

items.content_html: Mini Mealie is a lightweight Chrome extension designed to enhance the experience of Mealie, an open-source recipe manager. With Mini Mealie, users can quickly import recipes from any website into their Mealie instance with a simple right-click.
